name: Purple Basil Sherbet
description: Turkish non-alcoholic drink made of purple basil
directions: When you start seeing bubbles in your boiling water drop your purple basil into the water.
I assume you have washed your purple basil thoroughly before splashing it into the boiling water, that's why I do not mention it.
Let it boil for couple of minutes.
Meanwhile, slice your lemons in half and squeeze them.
Add the sugar and freshly squeezed lemon juice into the boiling purple basil.
Mix gently and let it boil for couple more minutes.
Turn off the heat and let it rest for couple of minutes.
Gently remove the purple basil from your mix.
Put your drink into a pitcher and to the fridge and let it cool.
